questions.question_text:
An organization suffered many major attacks and lost critical information, such as employee records, and financial information. Therefore, the management decides to hire a threat analyst to extract the strategic threat intelligence that provides high-level information regarding current cyber-security posture, threats, details on the financial impact of various cyber-activities, and so on.
Which of the following sources will help the analyst to collect the required intelligence?

choices.C: Campaign reports, malware, incident reports, attack group reports, human intelligence
choices.A: Active campaigns, attacks on other organizations, data feeds from external third parties

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is a correct answer it's a low-level data

Selected Answer: D
Answer is D
As per Module 06 Page 542 of CTIA Courseware

answer is D

pg 542

Low-level Data
Low-level data refers to the data collected from various monitoring systems such as operating-system log files, alerts generated by IDS, firewall logs, and application-level log files. Generally, low-level data is not useful without having a proper additional context. For example, the log files generated by a monitoring traffic flow may not seem to have useful information, but after performing analysis by the administrator, the same information can be used to detect an attack in the network.
D correct check page 542 ECC material

Selected Answer: D
Low level data is the correct answer

questions.question_text:
A network administrator working in an ABC organization collected log files generated by a traffic monitoring system, which may not seem to have useful information, but after performing proper analysis by him, the same information can be used to detect an attack in the network.
Which of the following categories of threat information has he collected?

choices.C: Sam did not use the proper standardization formats for representing threat data.
choices.D: Sam did not use the proper technology to use or consume the information.

discussion.content:

Answer is A
As per Module 03 Page 174 of CTIA Courseware

questions.question_text:
Sam works as an analyst in an organization named InfoTech Security. He was asked to collect information from various threat intelligence sources. In meeting the deadline, he forgot to verify the threat intelligence sources and used data from an open-source data provider, who offered it at a very low cost. Through it was beneficial at the initial stage but relying on such data providers can produce unreliable data and noise putting the organization network into risk.
What mistake Sam did that led to this situation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Tactical = TTPs
Technical = IoC

Operational threat intelligence provides detailed, actionable information about specific threats, including threat actor TTPs, malware campaigns, tools used by threat actors, and more. It is highly technical and is used by security operation managers and NOC staff to protect organizational resources against various threats.

Given that Alice shared highly technical information including threat actor TTPs, malware campaigns, and tools used by threat actors, the correct answer is:

D. Operational threat intelligence

Selected Answer: B
Answer is B
As per Module 06 Page 570 of CTIA Courseware

answer is B
pg 24
B is the correct answer

Selected Answer: B
B is the correct answer

Information shared by Alice was highly technical and include threat actor TTPs, malware campaigns, tools used by threat actors, and so on.
Which of the following types of threat intelligence was shared by Alice?

questions.question_text:
An XYZ organization hired Mr. Andrews, a threat analyst. In order to identify the threats and mitigate the effect of such threats, Mr. Andrews was asked to perform threat modeling. During the process of threat modeling, he collected important information about the treat actor and characterized the analytic behavior of the adversary that includes technological details, goals, and motives that can be useful in building a strong countermeasure.
What stage of the threat modeling is Mr. Andrews currently in?
